name: Invisibox
description: Invisibox is a tough puzzle game where you have to solve sliding puzzles by controlling invisible boxes while avoiding various obstacles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Processor: 2 Core @ 2.0Ghz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 20 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2+ Core @ 2.8Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Dedicated GPU DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 30 MB available space
